node.name: Windows Services & Process
node.rich_text: sc ALEX or <ip> of box query ServiceName

is the process that is responsible for enforcing the security policy on Windows systems. When a user attempts to log on to the system, this process verifies their log on attempt and creates access tokens based on the user's permission levels. LSASS is also responsible for user account password changes.
